mutants.code:
def count_beautiful_arrays(n: int) -> int:
    m = 1000000008
    p = 1
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        p *= 2 * n - i
        p *= pow(i, m - 2, m)
        p %= m
    return (2 * p - n) % m
